morning: In the morning we woke up at 7 am and got ready to go to the breakfast buffet.we quickly got a few plates filled with all their delicious food  we went back upstairs to pack our bags and everything thing else so we would be very organised and not forget anything. Finally  when we were done we headed downstairs to the reception to check out then got a few taxis to drop us off at the airport which took one hour to get there.
evening: After a long time in the flight, we were all very exhausted and tired. We had to go home to our hotel, which was very fancy and nice and slept until morning .while we slept my (caitlyn’s )grandpa and my mum went on a walk to the market for a cup of Vietnamese coffee.
title: Fly to Hội An
afternoon: When we finally arrived into the airport after one hour, we went to the check-in which was a very short line. I talk with about 15 minutes to get to the end of the line then after a line of security we finally got to the gate where we did some water colour painting for half an hour then we went to the airplane, It was very boring so I slept during the whole flight, Cailtyn was two rows behind us.
